questions.question: 1. The degree of static indeterminacy of a rigid jointed space frame is

explanations.a: Degree of static indeterminacy of a rigid jointed space frame is M + R - 2j

questions.question: 2. Degree of Indeterminacy for a beam fixed on both ends is ________

explanations.d: Degree of Indeterminacy for a beam fixed on both ends is 2

questions.question: 3. What will be the static indeterminacy for a beam having one end hinged and other end fixed

explanations.a: the static indeterminacy for a beam having one end hinged and other end fixed is zero

questions.question: 4. For any structure, when both ends have roller supports, then the structure will be
